title: FS/Trade N172 Harry Wright Looking Right HOF SGC 60
author: JamesGallo

posts.post_title: FS/Trade N172 Harry Wright Looking Right HOF SGC 60
posts.post_content:
This card is fresh from an estate and was just graded yesterday.  There is only 1 SGC 70 higher and this is the only 60.  PSA has several higher.

Card is very nice with a dark strong image and some corner wear.  

Please contact me at [url]jgallony@aol.com[/url] with any cash or trade offers.  A PSA 6 sold last year for near 12K.  I think this one has a darker sharper image.

Trade wise I am only looking for Joe Jackson and Boston Store cards, but other super high end cards might be considered.

Thanks

James G

Got a bunch of scan request and have sent them all out.  I didn't want to post a scan in case someone wanted to steal it and use it for something bad :-)

Back is clean.

James G
i noticed that there is one onb ebay right now same grade i believe

Yes that is my card and I just dropped the price a good amount ;-)

James G

Yea it REALLY has been one of those days.  BIN correct at $8500
